name: In re Issuance of Subpoenas Upon the Honorable Michael E. BORTNER, Stephen P. Limbaugh and Penny I. Blackwell of the York County Court of Common Pleas Petition of Stephen H. Stetler

parties: In re Issuance of Subpoenas Upon the Honorable Michael E. BORTNER, Stephen P. Limbaugh and Penny I. Blackwell of the York County Court of Common Pleas Petition of Stephen H. Stetler.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 14th day of June 2012, the Application for Leave to Issue Subpoena is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
50 A.3d 120
In re Issuance of Subpoenas Upon the Honorable Michael E. BORTNER, Stephen P. Limbaugh and Penny I. Blackwell of the York County Court of Common Pleas Petition of Stephen H. Stetler.
No. 104 EM 2012.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 14, 2012.
